New Records: Hunter Goodman hit a career-high seven RBI
Key Match Events: Hunter Goodman hit a tiebreaking grand slam in the eighth inning
Ezequiel Tovar hit his 23rd home run of the season
Brendan Rodgers added a run-scoring double
Michael Busch had three hits for the Cubs, including a three-run home run off Victor Vodnik
Isaac Paredes also had three hits
Ryan McMahon singled to start the bottom of the eighth
Post-Match Reflections: Hunter Goodman said there was some frustration after the top of the eighth inning but everyone rallied together
Rockies manager Bud Black praised Goodman's performance and his role in the team's youth movement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies snapped a six-game losing streak to the Cubs
With the loss, Chicago fell six games behind the Mets for the third NL wild card
Austin Gomber went six innings and allowed two runs on nine hits
